This is a Gholam Mızrakçılar (Slave Spearmen) unit of fifteen strips of two figures each (30 figures total). You will recieve one standard bearer and drummer strip (sv01a), eight column strips (a mix of sv01b–e) and six line strips (a mix of sv01f–h).
